message.content:
cs.HC, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.CY 

This paper discusses the use of sentiment analysis tools to monitor users' emotions expressed in app reviews or tweets, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also mentions the use of online reports about popular apps, which could fall under information retrieval (cs.IR) or social media (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of natural language processing techniques to analyze app reviews, which falls under computational linguistics (cs.CL). Finally, the paper discusses strategies for app vendors to maintain positive emotions and gain competitive advantages, which could fall under cybersecurity (cs.CY) or business (cs.BU).
